about_the_game:
This racing, roaring collection of bleeps and buzzes will be music to the ears of anyone playing your retro games! Composer Joel Steudler presents twenty tracks of exciting action music and blazing boss fights in the 8-bit style, along with a sizzling set of 150 sound effects to match!

Features:

* 20 music tracks suitable for action, boss fights, and menus!
* 150 SFX in the old-school style!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included for audio assets.
* Royalty free music and SFX to use in your RPG Maker VX Ace projects or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

Action - Classical Hero
Action - Dystopian Opening
Action - Future Zone
Action - Hyper Fighter
Action - Into Orbit
Action - Keep Moving
Action - Not So Bad
Action - Onward Upward
Action - Skies Of Fire
Action - Wrecking Crew
Boss - Blaster Master
Boss - Castle Hassle
Boss - Jet Powered
Boss - Metal Monster
Boss - Time Bomber
Menu - Bringer Of Doom
Menu - Combat Command
Menu - Freedom Fighters
Menu - High Flying
Menu - Lost In Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: These twenty retro action tracks are a blast from the past! Fill your game with authentic old-school music and sound effects.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
